sentences.sContent: I pointed with my scalpel to the chest cavity, where nothing but a black lump of coal squatted in the lipstick-red center.
sentences.sContent_eng: I pointed with my scalpel to the chest cavity, where nothing but a black lump of coal squatted in the lipstick-red center.
sentences.sCn: 我用解剖刀指着她的胸腔，那里只有一团黑乎乎的煤块，伏在唇膏般红色的胸腔中部。

trans.tranOther: a small, very sharp knife that is used by doctors in operations
